name: Reverse Time
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: **Next turn:** Heroes with lower initiative act before heroes with higher initiative;
this effect ignores immunity.
_(Resolve ties as normal.)_

name: Tear in Time
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: **Next turn:** Heroes with lower initiative act before heroes with higher initiative. This effect ignores immunity.

name: Unstable Timeline
text:
Place 2 ::token_glitch:: Glitch tokens in radius, with at least two spaces between each token;
if used as a defense, place 3 tokens instead.
An enemy hero in play chooses one of the Glitch tokens; you swap with that token.
**End of turn:** Remove all Glitch tokens.

name: Alternative Timelines
text:
You may play two cards each turn;
if you do, after the cards are revealed, retrieve one of your unresolved cards.

name: Time Snare
text: An enemy hero in range who has already resolved a card this turn discards a card, if able.

name: Temporal Punch
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you; when defending, the enemy hero must use the ::initiative:: Initiative value of their card and items instead of the ::defense_silver:: Defense value of their card and items.
_(Minion defense modifiers are applied as normal.)_

name: Time Walk
text: Move an enemy hero in range, who remained in the same space since the last turn, 2 spaces in a straight line.

name: Time Trap
text: An enemy hero in range who has already resolved a card this turn discards a card, if able.

name: Time Loop
text: Swap with an enemy hero in range who has already resolved a card this turn.

name: Temporal Slam
text: Target a unit adjacent to you; when defending, the enemy hero must use the ::initiative:: Initiative value of their card and items instead of the ::defense_silver:: Defense value of their card and items.

name: Flashback
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may place 3 ::token_glitch:: Glitch tokens in radius, with at least two spaces between each token;
if you do, up to 1 enemy hero in radius swaps with a Glitch token of their choice.
**End of turn:** Remove all Glitch tokens.

name: Fast Forward
text: Move an enemy hero in range, who remained in the same space since the last turn, 2 spaces in a straight line.

name: Time Capsule
text: You, and friendly heroes in radius, may retrieve all cards discarded this turn.

name: Time Bomb
text: An enemy hero in range who has already resolved a card this turn discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Time Warp
text:
**Choose one —**
- Swap with an enemy hero in range who has already resolved a card this turn.
- An enemy hero in range swaps their unresolved card with one of their resolved cards of their choice.

name: Temporal Judgement
text: Target a unit adjacent to you; when defending, the enemy hero must use the ::initiative:: Initiative value of their card and items instead of the ::defense_silver:: Defense value of their card and items.

name: Deja Vu
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may place 2 ::token_glitch:: Glitch tokens in radius, with at least two spaces between each token;
if you do, up to 1 enemy hero in radius swaps with a Glitch token of their choice.
**End of turn:** Remove all Glitch tokens.

name: Back to the Future
text:
**Choose one —**
- Place a unit in range into the space where that unit was at the start of this turn.
- Move an enemy hero in range, who remained in the same space since the last turn, 2 spaces in a straight line.

name: Future Proof
text:
**Choose one —**
- You, and friendly heroes in radius, may retrieve all cards discarded this turn.
- **This turn:** Friendly heroes in radius are immune to enemy actions.
